DataElement.preferredName: Overlap Distance Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Yes/No indicator related to the assessment of overlapping distant metastatic sites.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Are the 2 overlapping metasta
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are the 2 overlapping metastases within 5cm apart from inner edge to inner edge of the tumor or surgical resection bed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there 2 radiographically distinct metastases that are anatomically close(i.e,with less than or equal to 5cm of normal tissue between them)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is there 1 radiographically distinct metastasis,which was anatomically close(i.e, with less than or equal to 5cm of normal tissue between them) to another metastasis that was surgically resected within 90 days prior to study registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there 3-4 radiographically distinct metastases of any distribution in the allowed anatomical sites

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is there 1 radiographically distinct metastasis,which was anatomically close (i.e, with less than 5 cm of normal tissue between them) to another metastasis that was surgically resected within 90 days prior to study registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there 2 radiographically distinct metastases that are anatomically close( i.e, with less than 5 cm of normal tissue between them)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Metastases greater than 5 cm away from each other (defined as Edge to Edge of tumor)?

DataElement.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to NRG for by script Fri Jan 24 11:30:54 EST 2014
